Class Months

java.lang.Object
Months
public class Months
extends java.lang.Object
A class that holds relevant information regarding the months of the gregorian calender.
Author:
Abdullah Salem, Gent Blaku

  • Method Details

    • MaxDaysPerMonth

      public static int MaxDaysPerMonth​(int month, boolean isLeapYear)
      A function that fetches the maximum possible days of any given month.
      Parameters:
      month - is the number representing the order of the months.
      isLeapYear - is a boolean to account for a leap year
      Returns:
      an integer holding the maximum possible days of the given month

    • MaxDaysPerMonth

      public static int MaxDaysPerMonth​(int month)
      A function that fetches the maximum possible days of any given month.
      Parameters:
      month - is the number representing the order of the months.
      Returns:
      an integer holding the maximum possible days of the given month
